main_definition: Enterprises refer to businesses, organizations or ventures involved in commercial, industrial or professional activities aimed at generating profit.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Businesses engaged in manufacturing and selling goods
meanings_and_examples.example: The automotive enterprises such as Ford and Toyota produce cars for the market.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Companies involved in providing services rather than products
meanings_and_examples.example: Enterprises like Google provide online search services, while law firms offer legal consulting.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Entrepreneurial ventures or startups aimed at creating and growing new businesses
meanings_and_examples.example: A group of entrepreneurs may establish a tech startup focused on developing innovative software solutions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Non-profit organizations that are involved in social enterprise activities
meanings_and_examples.example: Enterprises like TOMS Shoes operate under the model of providing shoes to underserved communities while also making a profit.
